title: I download game Replay how to report trolling guys

replies.body:
why would you need to get  a replay? they have all the gameplay data already including click speed, click location, timings on when keys were pressed etc.

Just report them at the post game screen.

Keep in mind that feeding alone is not always necessary trolling.
Scroll down to Support on the website and click submit a request (or just click [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).)
